mapper.select: SELECT a.atdc_no ,a.lecap_no ,a.std_no ,a.atdc_yn_cd ,a.atdc_week FORM attendance a, lecture_aply b WHERE a.lecap_no = b.lecap_no

/*kr.or.hku.classroom.mapper.AttendanceMapper.getStdList */ SELECT s.std_no FROM course_regist cr JOIN student s ON cr.STD_NO = s.STD_NO JOIN lecture_aply l ON cr.LECAP_NO = l.LECAP_NO WHERE l.lecap_no = #{lecapNo}
